headline: Jeff Bezos Once Said The Universe Wants You To Be 'Typical,' But There Is A Price To Pay For Being Yourself As Well: 'Not Easy Or Free'
summary: Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos used his final letter to shareholders as chief executive to deliver an unusually personal warning that companies and people only survive if they fight the powerful pull to become "typical." headline: How Walmart, Target, Amazon pay holiday workers (and who's hiring)
summary: Over the years, major brick-and-mortar chains have crept the start of the holiday season earlier. What used to begin on Black Friday now starts essentially the moment Halloween ends. headline: Shaq Refused To Spend $80,000 On A Security System. Instead, He Invested In A Startup Jeff Bezos Eventually Bought For $1B

Whether it was dominating on the basketball court or launching affordable sneakers at Walmart, Shaq’s path to wealth has often been unconventional. headline: Amazon issues urgent alert on recalled portable batteries
summary: More than 210,000 portable chargers sold on Amazon are being recalled after federal safety regulators warned that a popular power bank can overheat, ignite, and cause fires — leading to burn injuries. So far, the recalled batteries are implicated in more than $380,000 in property damage. The recall ...

headline: Paramount Ups Warner Bros. Battle With Trump Son-in-Law at Side
summary: Paramount Skydance Corp. launched a hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. at $30 a share in cash on Monday, just days after the company agreed to a deal with Netflix Inc. The offer values Warner Bros. at $108.4 billion, including debt.  Paramount’s offer is for all of Warner Bros., while Netflix is interested only in the Hollywood studios, HBO and the streaming business.

content.title: Paramount Ups Warner Bros. Battle With Trump Son-in-Law at Side
content.summary: Paramount Skydance Corp. launched a hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. at $30 a share in cash on Monday, just days after the company agreed to a deal with Netflix Inc. The offer values Warner Bros. at $108.4 billion, including debt.  Paramount’s offer is for all of Warner Bros., while Netflix is interested only in the Hollywood studios, HBO and the streaming business.

headline: Is Amazon Still Attractive After Flat 1 Year Return And Recent 3% Pullback?
summary: Wondering if Amazon.com at $226.89 still looks attractive at its current price, or if most of the potential upside is already priced in? This breakdown can help you assess whether the stock appears cheap, fair, or stretched based on the available numbers. Despite being roughly flat over the last year with a 0.4% return, the stock still carries a 150.6% gain over three years. This reminds investors that short-term wobble, such as the recent 3% dip in the past week, can sit on top of a much...

headline: Reply Achieves the AWS Agentic AI Specialization and Is Named an Implementation Partner for Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
summary: TURIN, Italy, December 09, 2025--Reply [EXM, STAR: REY] announced that it has achieved the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Agentic AI Specialization, a new category within the AWS AI Competency. This recognition positions Reply and its companies specialized in AWS technologies - Data Reply and Storm Reply - among the AWS Partners able to help customers deploy smart, self-operating AI systems that can think, plan, and act autonomously to execute complex business processes.

content.title: Reply Achieves the AWS Agentic AI Specialization and Is Named an Implementation Partner for Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
content.summary: TURIN, Italy, December 09, 2025--Reply [EXM, STAR: REY] announced that it has achieved the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Agentic AI Specialization, a new category within the AWS AI Competency. This recognition positions Reply and its companies specialized in AWS technologies - Data Reply and Storm Reply - among the AWS Partners able to help customers deploy smart, self-operating AI systems that can think, plan, and act autonomously to execute complex business processes.

thumbnail.caption: Through Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, organizations can simplify and secure the development of intelligent agents at scale, interact with enterprise systems, analyze data in real time, and automate complex processes.

headline: How Mag 7's lead over other stocks could shrink in 2026
summary: Yardeni Research president, Ed Yardeni, has changed his tune on the Big Tech trade, effectively switching to Underweight on "Magnificent Seven" stocks. HB Wealth chief market strategist, Gina Martin Adams, joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss the health of the Big Tech trade and explain where she sees it heading next year. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Microsoft to invest more than $5.4 billion in Canada to boost AI infrastructure
summary: Microsoft said on Tuesday it was investing more than C$7.5 billion ($5.42 billion) in Canada over the next two years, its ​latest in a series of investments in artificial intelligence infrastructure globally.  New ‌capacity under the investment will begin to come online in the second half of 2026, Microsoft ‌said, adding that its total estimated investment in Canada amounts to C$19 billion between 2023 and 2027.  Microsoft has pledged hefty investments worldwide this year, as the company races to secure more cloud computing capacity to meet the surging demand for AI workloads.

content.title: Microsoft to invest more than $5.4 billion in Canada to boost AI infrastructure
content.summary: Microsoft said on Tuesday it was investing more than C$7.5 billion ($5.42 billion) in Canada over the next two years, its ​latest in a series of investments in artificial intelligence infrastructure globally.  New ‌capacity under the investment will begin to come online in the second half of 2026, Microsoft ‌said, adding that its total estimated investment in Canada amounts to C$19 billion between 2023 and 2027.  Microsoft has pledged hefty investments worldwide this year, as the company races to secure more cloud computing capacity to meet the surging demand for AI workloads.

thumbnail.caption: FILE PHOTO: A Microsoft logo is seen in Issy-les-Moulineaux near Paris

headline: Reliance-Disney's JioHotstar to invest $444 million in south Indian content, executive says
summary: India's JioHotstar plans to invest $444 million over five years to acquire and produce content from south India, an executive ​said on Monday, as the Walt Disney and Reliance Industries-owned streaming ‌platform seeks to capitalize on growing demand for regional cinema.  The expansion comes at a time when ‌the Mumbai-based Hindi film industry is struggling to regain its allure in the world's most-populous country even as south Indian films gain wider acceptance locally and globally, rivaling Hindi films' box-office performance.  "To reiterate our belief in this market, we are committed ⁠to spend 40 billion ‌rupees ... over the (next) 5 years on JioHotstar," said Krishnan Kutty, the head of entertainment for southern India at JioStar, the Reliance-Disney ‍joint venture that runs the streaming platform.

content.title: Reliance-Disney's JioHotstar to invest $444 million in south Indian content, executive says
content.summary: India's JioHotstar plans to invest $444 million over five years to acquire and produce content from south India, an executive ​said on Monday, as the Walt Disney and Reliance Industries-owned streaming ‌platform seeks to capitalize on growing demand for regional cinema.  The expansion comes at a time when ‌the Mumbai-based Hindi film industry is struggling to regain its allure in the world's most-populous country even as south Indian films gain wider acceptance locally and globally, rivaling Hindi films' box-office performance.  "To reiterate our belief in this market, we are committed ⁠to spend 40 billion ‌rupees ... over the (next) 5 years on JioHotstar," said Krishnan Kutty, the head of entertainment for southern India at JioStar, the Reliance-Disney ‍joint venture that runs the streaming platform.

thumbnail.caption: A man uses the JioHotstar app on his mobile phone in New Delhi

headline: Burgex Mining Consultants Releases 2026 Macro Outlook: "The Era of Easy Geology is Over; The Era of Sovereign Strategy Has Begun"
summary: Burgex Mining Consultants, a leader in mining market analysis and feasibility services, today released its 2026 Macro Outlook. This comprehensive report details the global economy's structural pivot from globalization to resource nationalism. The report warns that the convergence of sovereign debt, the AI infrastructure boom, and critical mineral deficits will create the most complex operating environment in modern mining history.

content.title: Burgex Mining Consultants Releases 2026 Macro Outlook: "The Era of Easy Geology is Over; The Era of Sovereign Strategy Has Begun"
content.summary: Burgex Mining Consultants, a leader in mining market analysis and feasibility services, today released its 2026 Macro Outlook. This comprehensive report details the global economy's structural pivot from globalization to resource nationalism. The report warns that the convergence of sovereign debt, the AI infrastructure boom, and critical mineral deficits will create the most complex operating environment in modern mining history.

headline: Lippincott Unveils Go-to Brands 2025: LEGO, Canva, and Affirm Top U.S. Customer Rankings
summary: Drawing on its annual survey of more than 15,000 American customers, global brand, marketing, and experience consultancy Lippincott announced its inaugural U.S. Go-to Brands List, spotlighting the nation's most beloved and trusted brands as rated by their own customers. Leading the pack are LEGO, Canva, and Affirm, each recognized as Best in Show in their respective categories.

content.title: Lippincott Unveils Go-to Brands 2025: LEGO, Canva, and Affirm Top U.S. Customer Rankings

Leading the pack are LEGO, Canva, and Affirm, each recognized as Best in Show in their respective categories.

headline: VQ Capital Launches an AI-Driven Platform Engineered for the Next Generation of Investments
summary: VQ Capital launched today as a thesis-driven, AI-native investment platform designed to scale companies into category leaders. The firm focuses on two foundational theses: the AI Transformation of Consumer Companies and the "Golden Dome" for Cyber Intelligence.

headline: Disney’s Entertainment Model Stumbles as Amazon Doubles Down on AI Infrastructure Spending
summary: Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) and Disney (NYSE: DIS) just reported earnings revealing two companies moving in opposite directions.
